page.title: 10 Everyday Life.
page.content: {A day in the life of Catherine Hindle. My alarm goes off at 7.00am.and I get out of bed and get dressed.Mum comes and asks what I want for my breakfast.I have Bran Flakes and sultanas.I do my teeth and face,make my bed and pack my lunch.At 8.15am.I'm in the car going to my friend's house. I collect the daily paper and walk to school where my friend waits at the gate.We walk in together.One of the teachers comes out and blows a whistle and we go into school.In assembly a teacher talks about someone or something.Back in our class bay we have maths and English.At dinner time I have egg sandwiches,fruit,nuts and a Solar bar.In the afternoon we read, talk or do art.After break it is P.E. or story.Back home I do my project and piano practice then have tea and go to gym.Bedtime is 9.30.
